channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache HugeGraph-Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache HugeGraph-Server

item.title: CVE-2024-27349|2024-04-22T14:08:56.591Z -- Apache Software Foundation -- Apache HugeGraph-Server
item.description:
Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in Apache HugeGraph-Server.This issue affects Apache HugeGraph-Server: from 1.0.0 before 1.3.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.3.0, which fixes the issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-27348|2024-04-22T14:08:06.294Z -- Apache Software Foundation -- Apache HugeGraph-Server
item.description:
RCE-Remote Command Execution vulnerability in Apache HugeGraph-Server.This issue affects Apache HugeGraph-Server: from 1.0.0 before 1.3.0 in Java8 & Java11
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.3.0 with Java11 & enable the Auth system, which fixes the issue.
